title: How to Make an Origami Chair

steps.title: Start with a six inch square piece of paper.
steps.content: Start with a six inch square piece of paper. Lay it with the colored side facing down. Fold it in half hot-dog style (there should be two long sides) and crease well.

steps.title: Fold the right and left side so they meet at the middle crease, and crease them well.
steps.content: Fold the right and left side so they meet at the middle crease, and crease them well.

steps.title: The paper should be divided into four equal parts.
steps.content: The paper should be divided into four equal parts. Cut off one of the parts.

steps.title: Fold the paper the other way, and crease well.
steps.content: Fold the paper the other way, and crease well.

steps.title: Fold the top right corner to meet the first vertical line and crease well.
steps.content: Fold the top right corner to meet the first vertical line and crease well.

steps.title: Repeat the previous step for the left corner.
steps.content: Repeat the previous step for the left corner.

steps.title: Do a squash fold.
steps.content: Do a squash fold. Starting with the right corner, unfold the crease you just made. Open it slightly and then squash it down to form a triangle.

steps.title: Repeat the last step for the left corner.
steps.content: Repeat the last step for the left corner.

steps.title: Fold the center flap up to meet the top edge.
steps.content: Fold the center flap up to meet the top edge.

steps.title: Fold the right side to the left.
steps.content: Fold the right side to the left. Crease well and unfold.

steps.title: Fold the left side to the right, crease and unfold.
steps.content: Fold the left side to the right, crease and unfold.

steps.title: Bring the top flap down.
steps.content: Bring the top flap down. Tape or glue it.

steps.title: And that's it!
steps.content: And that's it! Enjoy your origami chair.
